wallet.title: Web3 Wallet
wallet.subtitle: Sovereign Asset Management through corporate digital signature
wallet.description1: ProcureData's engine is designed to be non-intrusive. The Web3 Wallet allows companies to sign transactions with their private key, ensuring that no one else can move their funds or authorize data.
wallet.description2: Through EIP-712 signature, companies can sign digital legal contracts with cryptographic certainty that their identity is verifiable and non-repudiable.

protocol.label: Protocol
protocol.value: EIP-712 Signature for digital legal contracts

wallet.benefit: Eliminates dependence on banking intermediaries for international transaction validation. Instant settlement without SWIFT commissions.

ssi.title: SSI Identity
ssi.subtitle: Decentralized Corporate Identity under the Gaia-X Trust Framework
ssi.description1: SSI identity allows companies to own and manage their digital credentials without depending on centralized intermediaries.
ssi.description2: Verifiable credentials are issued by trusted entities and stored in the company's own wallet, enabling instant verification without exposing sensitive data.
ssi.benefit: Reduce KYB verification time from weeks to minutes. Credentials are reusable across the entire data ecosystem.

euroe.title: EUROe Payments
euroe.subtitle: Instant Settlement in regulated currency under MiCA regulation
euroe.whyDescription: Traditional bank transfers take 24-72 hours and generate administrative friction. With EUROe, each transaction is settled in seconds via Smart Contract.

contract.title: Contract
contract.desc: ODRL contract + price is automatically generated

escrow.title: Escrow
escrow.desc: Payment is locked in Smart Contract

release.title: Release
release.desc: Upon receipt verification, payment is released to provider

cta.title: Ready to eliminate financial friction?
cta.description: Try the EUROe payment system and experience instant settlement.

odrl.title: ODRL Governance
odrl.subtitle: Self-executing digital contracts for data sovereignty
odrl.whyDescription: ODRL policies define exactly what can and cannot be done with your data. Each permission is cryptographically signed and automatically enforced.

cta.title: Define your data policies
cta.description: Create ODRL contracts that automatically enforce your business rules.

rls.title: Multi-Tenant RLS
rls.subtitle: Enterprise-level Data Isolation through Row Level Security
rls.whyDescription: Row Level Security ensures that each organization can only access its own data. It's not a filter in the application—it's enforced at the database level.
rls.description1: ProcureData uses PostgreSQL's native RLS policies to guarantee data isolation. Each query is automatically filtered by the authenticated organization's ID.
rls.description2: This means that even if there's a bug in the application, no organization can access data from another organization.
rls.benefit: Total confidence that your supply chain data is completely isolated, even in a multi-tenant environment.

cta.title: Your data, completely isolated
cta.description: Explore how RLS protects your information at the database level.

audit.title: Audit Logs
audit.subtitle: Immutable Audit Records through blockchain notarization
audit.whyDescription: Every action in ProcureData is recorded with a timestamp, actor identity, and blockchain hash. This provides irrefutable proof for regulatory compliance.
audit.verificationDesc: Each log entry is hashed and anchored to the blockchain, providing cryptographic proof of integrity.
audit.benefit: Regulatory-grade audit trail that satisfies compliance requirements for ISO 27001, SOC 2, and GDPR Article 30.

cta.title: Complete audit transparency
cta.description: Every action is recorded, verified, and immutable.

idsa.title: IDSA Model
idsa.subtitle: Architecture Based on the International Data Spaces Association Standard
idsa.whyDescription: The IDSA model defines clear roles for data exchange: Consumer, Subject, and Data Holder. This separation enables sovereign data sharing while maintaining control.

consumer.title: Consumer
consumer.desc: Entity that requests and uses data

holder.title: Data Holder
holder.desc: Entity that stores and provides data

idsa.benefit: Future-proof architecture that ensures interoperability with European data spaces like Catena-X, Agri-Gaia, and Manufacturing-X.

cta.title: Join the data economy
cta.description: Build on standards that connect you to the European data ecosystem.

erp.title: ERP Connectors
erp.subtitle: Plug & Play Integration with Core Systems through REST API and Webhooks
erp.whyDescription: Connect your existing ERP system to ProcureData without modifying your core infrastructure. Our connectors handle data transformation and synchronization automatically.

select.title: Select
select.desc: Choose your ERP from the marketplace

configure.title: Configure
configure.desc: Map fields and set sync rules

erps.label: ERPs

erp.benefit: Reduce integration time from months to hours. No custom development required.

edge.title: Edge Functions
edge.subtitle: Scalable Business Logic through distributed serverless processing
edge.whyDescription: Edge Functions run your business logic close to your data sources. This reduces latency and enables real-time processing for IoT and streaming use cases.

anonymize.title: Anonymize
anonymize.desc: Remove PII before data leaves the edge

edge.benefit: Process data at the edge for IoT, reduce bandwidth costs, and meet data residency requirements.

cta.title: Deploy logic at the edge

tour.title: Guided Tour
tour.subtitle: Interactive Onboarding that eliminates the learning curve
tour.whyDescription: New users complete our guided tour in under 10 minutes and are immediately productive. The tour adapts to your role and highlights features relevant to you.
tour.ariaMessage: Let me show you how to navigate your supplier data
tour.benefit: Reduce onboarding time and support tickets. Users become productive on day one.

cta.title: Experience the tour
cta.description: See how easy it is to get started.

docs.title: Interactive Docs
docs.subtitle: Living Documentation for enterprise development teams
docs.whyDescription: Our documentation is not just text—it's an interactive playground where you can test API calls, see real responses, and copy code snippets directly into your projects.
docs.benefit: Developer-first documentation that accelerates integration and reduces back-and-forth with support.

cta.title: Explore the docs
cta.description: Everything you need to integrate with ProcureData.

alerts.title: Smart Alerts
alerts.subtitle: Proactive Risk Intelligence through rule engines
alerts.whyDescription: Smart Alerts monitor your supply chain continuously and notify you before problems occur. Expired certificates, unusual patterns, compliance deadlines—all tracked automatically.
alerts.benefit: Prevent supply chain disruptions by acting on early warnings. Reduce risk exposure by 60%.

cta.title: Configure your alerts
cta.description: Stay ahead of supply chain risks.

activity.title: Activity Feed
activity.subtitle: Critical Event Traceability in milliseconds
activity.whyDescription: The Activity Feed gives you real-time visibility into everything happening in your data ecosystem. Filter by organization, event type, or time range to find exactly what you need.
activity.description1: Every event in ProcureData is captured in real-time with full context: who, what, when, and why. This enables complete traceability for compliance and debugging.
activity.description2: The feed is searchable, filterable, and exportable. Integrate it with your SIEM or monitoring tools via our API.
activity.benefit: 360° visibility into your data operations. Debug issues instantly, prove compliance effortlessly.

cta.title: See everything, miss nothing
cta.description: Real-time visibility into your data ecosystem.
